thread.title: Israel rejects cease-fire, prepares for ground invasion of Lebanon | Flipboard
thread.title_full: Israel rejects cease-fire, prepares for ground invasion of Lebanon | Flipboard

author: TODAY
title: Israel rejects cease-fire, prepares for ground invasion of Lebanon | Flipboard
text:
Israel is preparing its troops for a possible ground offensive in Lebanon following a week of intense airstrikes on Hezbollah targets. Meanwhile, the United States is pushing for both sides to accept a 21-day cease-fire as the fighting rages on. NBC’s Richard Engel reports for TODAY.
